languages.text: "Всеотец одарил тебя сильным чутьем. Его сотворил Скьядди Думающий Дважды. Духи любили его, а под саги о его проницательности можно пировать всю долгую ночь Хельвинтра. Он был моим другом". {n}На лицо, только что светившееся от свирепой гордости, ложится угрюмая тень.{/n}

"The Allfather gifted you with strong intuition. This was made by Skyaddi Twice-Thinker. The spirits liked him, and one could feast a whole long Helwinter night to the words of his saga, so keen was his mind. He was my friend." {n}Ulfar's face, lit a moment ago with ruthless pride, seems to darken as if a shadow passed across it.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Всеотец одарил тебя сильным чутьем. Его сотворил Скьядди Думающий Дважды. Духи любили его, а под саги о его проницательности можно пировать всю долгую ночь Хельвинтра. Он был моим другом". {n}На лицо, только что светившееся от свирепой гордости, ложится угрюмая тень.{/n}

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “看来全父赐予了你敏锐的直觉，这件护身符是‘思量者’斯卡蒂打造的。所有人都曾很喜欢他，他的史诗足以让人们在整个赫尔之冬传唱不止，他的思想是如此敏锐。他曾是我的朋友。”{n}乌尔法的脸上刚刚还带着不羁的高傲，此刻却黯淡了下来，仿佛洒下了一道阴影。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Allfather gifted you with strong intuition. This was made by Skyaddi Twice-Thinker. The spirits liked him, and one could feast a whole long Helwinter night to the words of his saga, so keen was his mind. He was my friend." {n}Ulfar's face, lit a moment ago with ruthless pride, seems to darken as if a shadow passed across it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “看来全父赐予了你敏锐的直觉，这件护身符是‘思量者’斯卡蒂打造的。所有人都曾很喜欢他，他的史诗足以让人们在整个赫尔之冬传唱不止，他的思想是如此敏锐。他曾是我的朋友。”{n}乌尔法的脸上刚刚还带着不羁的高傲，此刻却黯淡了下来，仿佛洒下了一道阴影。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «El Padre de todas las cosas le ha dado una intuición excelente. Lo creó Skyaddi el Pensador Concienzudo. Les gustaba a los espíritus y se podía pasar toda una noche del Invierno de Hela celebrando su saga, de lo aguda que era su mente. Y era un gran amigo». {n}La cara de Ulfar, hasta hace un momento el vivo retrato del orgullo, se oscurece por el paso de una sombra.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Allfather gifted you with strong intuition. This was made by Skyaddi Twice-Thinker. The spirits liked him, and one could feast a whole long Helwinter night to the words of his saga, so keen was his mind. He was my friend." {n}Ulfar's face, lit a moment ago with ruthless pride, seems to darken as if a shadow passed across it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «El Padre de todas las cosas le ha dado una intuición excelente. Lo creó Skyaddi el Pensador Concienzudo. Les gustaba a los espíritus y se podía pasar toda una noche del Invierno de Hela celebrando su saga, de lo aguda que era su mente. Y era un gran amigo». {n}La cara de Ulfar, hasta hace un momento el vivo retrato del orgullo, se oscurece por el paso de una sombra.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「全知の父は強力な直観力を授けた。これはスキアディ・トゥワイス・シンカーが作ったものだ。精霊たちは彼のことが好きで、ヘルウィンターの長い夜を、彼のサーガの言葉に酔いしれた。鋭敏さこそが彼の心であり、彼は我が友だった」{n}さっきまで冷酷なプライドに照らされていたウルファーの顔が、まるで影が差したように暗くなった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Allfather gifted you with strong intuition. This was made by Skyaddi Twice-Thinker. The spirits liked him, and one could feast a whole long Helwinter night to the words of his saga, so keen was his mind. He was my friend." {n}Ulfar's face, lit a moment ago with ruthless pride, seems to darken as if a shadow passed across it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「全知の父は強力な直観力を授けた。これはスキアディ・トゥワイス・シンカーが作ったものだ。精霊たちは彼のことが好きで、ヘルウィンターの長い夜を、彼のサーガの言葉に酔いしれた。鋭敏さこそが彼の心であり、彼は我が友だった」{n}さっきまで冷酷なプライドに照らされていたウルファーの顔が、まるで影が差したように暗くなった。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Der Allvater hat Euch mit einer starken Intuition gesegnet. Skyaddi Zweifachdenker hat das gefertigt. Die Geister mochten ihn, und man konnte eine ganze lange Helwinter-Nacht hindurch zu den Worten seiner Saga feiern, so scharf war sein Verstand. Er war mein Freund." {n}Ulfars Gesicht, eben noch vor gnadenlosem Stolz strahlend, scheint sich zu verdüstern, als würde ein Schatten darüber hinwegziehen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Allfather gifted you with strong intuition. This was made by Skyaddi Twice-Thinker. The spirits liked him, and one could feast a whole long Helwinter night to the words of his saga, so keen was his mind. He was my friend." {n}Ulfar's face, lit a moment ago with ruthless pride, seems to darken as if a shadow passed across it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Der Allvater hat Euch mit einer starken Intuition gesegnet. Skyaddi Zweifachdenker hat das gefertigt. Die Geister mochten ihn, und man konnte eine ganze lange Helwinter-Nacht hindurch zu den Worten seiner Saga feiern, so scharf war sein Verstand. Er war mein Freund." {n}Ulfars Gesicht, eben noch vor gnadenlosem Stolz strahlend, scheint sich zu verdüstern, als würde ein Schatten darüber hinwegziehen.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Le Père de Tous vous a doté d'une bonne intuition. Celui-ci a été réalisé par Skyaddi l'Avisé. Les esprits l'appréciaient, et l'on pouvait festoyer pendant toute une nuit de l'Hiver Infernal en écoutant sa saga, tant son esprit était vif. C'était mon ami. » {n}Le visage d'Ulfar, illuminé l'instant d'avant par une fierté assumée, se fait plus sombre, comme si une ombre le traversait.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Allfather gifted you with strong intuition. This was made by Skyaddi Twice-Thinker. The spirits liked him, and one could feast a whole long Helwinter night to the words of his saga, so keen was his mind. He was my friend." {n}Ulfar's face, lit a moment ago with ruthless pride, seems to darken as if a shadow passed across it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Le Père de Tous vous a doté d'une bonne intuition. Celui-ci a été réalisé par Skyaddi l'Avisé. Les esprits l'appréciaient, et l'on pouvait festoyer pendant toute une nuit de l'Hiver Infernal en écoutant sa saga, tant son esprit était vif. C'était mon ami. » {n}Le visage d'Ulfar, illuminé l'instant d'avant par une fierté assumée, se fait plus sombre, comme si une ombre le traversait.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "The Allfather gifted you with strong intuition. This was made by Skyaddi Twice-Thinker. The spirits liked him, and one could feast a whole long Helwinter night to the words of his saga, so keen was his mind. He was my friend." {n}Ulfar's face, lit a moment ago with ruthless pride, seems to darken as if a shadow passed across it.{/n}

languages.text: "Yücebaba sana güçlü sezgiler bahşetmiş. Bu tılsım, Skyaddi Çift Düşünür tarafından yapıldı. Ruhlar onu severdi, öyle keskin zekâlıydı ki uzun bir Acı Kış gecesini onun destanlarını dinleyerek geçirebilirdin. Benim dostumdu." {n}Ulfar'ın bir saniye önce gururla aydınlanan yüzü, sanki bulutlarla kaplanmış gibi kararıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Allfather gifted you with strong intuition. This was made by Skyaddi Twice-Thinker. The spirits liked him, and one could feast a whole long Helwinter night to the words of his saga, so keen was his mind. He was my friend." {n}Ulfar's face, lit a moment ago with ruthless pride, seems to darken as if a shadow passed across it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Yücebaba sana güçlü bir sezgi gücü vermiş. Bu tılsım Skyaddi Çift Düşünür tarafından yapıldı. Ruhlar onu severdi ve öyle keskin zekâlıydı ki uzun bir Acı Kış gecesini onun destanlarını dinleyerek geçirebilirdin. Benim dostum olurdu." {n}Ulfar'ın bir saniye önce gururla aydınlanan yüzü, sanki bulutlarla kaplanmış gibi kararıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
